monsters.name: The Sliver Queen
monsters.combat: The Sliver Queen may use any 2 actions during its combat.

actions.name: Talon.
actions.desc: The Sliver Queen slashes one creature in immediate distance, dealing 9 points of damage.

actions.name: Engulfing Charge
actions.desc: The Sliver Queen moves at least a short distance and enters another creatures space. That target must succed a Speed defence roll of 7 (21). On a failed roll, the creature takes 9 Intellect damage (and ignores Armor), and is engulfed. The engulfed creature takes 5 Intellect damage at the start of The Sliver Queens turn. When The Sliver Queen moves, the creature moves with it. An engulfed creature can try to escape by making a Might defense roll of 7 (21).

actions.name: Spawn Harbinger
actions.desc: (uses both actions) The Sliver Queen deals 3 damage to itself (and ignores Armor), and creates a <STATBLOCK-LINK>Sliver Harbinger</STATBLOCK-LINK> from the wound. The Harbinger appears in an unoccupied space within a short distance from its creator

actions.name: Hive Controll
actions.desc: (uses both actions) The Sliver Queen chooses 5 slivers a short distance away. The chosen slives can move an immediate distance and make one talon attack.

monsters.name: Earthshaker
monsters.mod: Speed defense as level 4 due to size
monsters.combat: An earthshaker attacks with its impressive display of tusks and can target up to four creatures (standing next to each other) with a single attack.

actions.desc: An earthshaker can also make a trampling attack if it can get up to speed first by making a charge from long range. When it does, it moves 200 feet (61 m) in a round, and anything that comes within immediate range is attacked. Even those who make a successful Speed defence roll take 2 points of damage.

monsters.name: Krystal Element
monsters.combat: A Krystal Element can fire a beam of energy at foes within a range of 200 feet (61 m), but it can vary the type of beam based on the situation.

actions.desc: A blast of raw force that inflicts 6 points of damage on one target.
A ray of psychic damage energy that inflicts 4 points of Intellect damage on one target (and ignores Armor)
A beam of nerve-targeting energy that paralyzes one target if the fails a Might defence roll. Each round, the paralyzed victim can attempt another Might defense roll to shrug off the effect
A burst of heat that inflicts 3 points of damage on all creatures within immediate range (rather than its normal range)

monsters.name: Naga
monsters.combat: En naga angriper enten med et langt spyd, eller ved å kaste diverse former for magi. Noen formler kan hindre karakterers mulighet til å bevege seg. Samarbeider med andre naga rundt seg.

monsters.name: Collapsing Roof
monsters.combat: Her kan spillerne gjøre sitt beste for å hjelpe Roy. Han sitter fastklemt, men det å løfte bort restene krever en lvl 5 check. Ved en kritisk feil kollapser mer av etasjen over ned, og gjør 5 skade på spillerne, og Roy dør. Ved en feil, kollapser litt av etasjen over, og spillerne tar 5 skade, men Roy lever ennå. På en suksess får de Roy ut, og han overlever. Ved en kritisk suksess får de Roy ut, og han er i form nok til å hjelp de i neste encounter.

monsters.name: Sjøvandrer
monsters.combat: En Sjøvandrer svinger rundt seg med hva enn den har i armene. Den har en kjetting og halsbånd av metall rundt halsen, og har plukket opp en kjerre som han veiver rundt. Det er lite mening i hva han slår på, og hvordan. Han virker å være i full berserk. Alle spillerne på hver runde rulle forsvar 4 (12) for å unngå å bli truffet. Ved en kritisk feil havner de direkte forran Sjøvandreren, og blir kastet av gårde. Ved en kritisk suksess får noen tak i kjettingen, og kan roe ned monsteret.

monsters.name: Sen Cho (Cho Sen)
monsters.combat: Cho angriper hver runde hvem enn han ser. Han stormer over og slår gjentatte ganger, og utfører store volter og flashy moves.

monsters.name: Reikokuna
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 18

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.desc: When submerged in water, the dragon has advantage on Stealth checks. If the dragon hits a creature that can’t see it with its bite, it can deal piercing damage and grapple the target simultaneously.

traits.name: Ruthless (1/Round)
traits.desc: After scoring a critical hit on its turn, the dragon can immediately make one claw attack.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The dragon’s spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. 3 each/day

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales acid in a 40-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Skorost
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 19

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales lightning in an 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Zerleg
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 18

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 (16d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: FanKang
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 17

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Yao
monsters.speed: 40 ft., burrow 20 ft., fly 80 ft., swim 40 ft.
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 16

traits.name: Ice Walk
traits.desc: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra moment.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Dronning Sidsi
spells: Sidsi is an 18th level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). Sidsi can cast shield at level 1 and alter self at level 2 without expending a spell slot. They have the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, message, prestidigitation

spells.1st-level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, mage armor, shield

traits.name: Foresight.
traits.desc: When the foresight spell is active, Sidsi can’t be surprised and has advantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. In addition, other creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against Sidsi

traits.name: Mind Blank.
traits.desc: When the mind blank spell is active, Sidsi is immune to psychic damage, any effect that would read their emotions or thoughts, divination spells, and the charmed condition.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip; V, S)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +9 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d10) fire damage.

actions.name: Lightning Bolt (3rd-Level; V, S, M)
actions.desc: A bolt of lightning 5 feet wide and 100 feet long arcs from Sidsi Each creature in the area makes a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) lightning damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

actions.name: Confusion (4th-Level; V, S, M, Concentration)
actions.desc: Each creature within 10 feet of a point Sidsi can see within 120 feet makes a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw, becoming rattled until the end of its next turn on a success. On a failure, a creature is confused for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Cone of Cold (5th-Level; V, S, M)
actions.desc: Frost blasts from Sidsi in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) cold damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

actions.name: Mislead (5th-Level; S, Concentration)
actions.desc: Sidsi becomes invisible for 1 hour. At the same time, an illusory copy of Sidsi appears in their space. Sidsi can use an action to move the copy up to 60 feet and have it speak or gesture. The copy is revealed as an illusion with any physical interaction, as solid objects and creatures pass through it. Sidsi can use a bonus action to switch between their copy’s senses or their own; while using their copy’s senses, the archmage’s body is blind and deaf. The invisibility, but not the duplicate, ends if Sidsi casts another spell

actions.name: Globe of Invulnerability (6th-Level; V, S, M, Concentration)
actions.desc: A glimmering, 10-foot-radius sphere appears around Sidsi. It remains for 1 minute and doesn’t move with her. Any 5th-level or lower spell cast from outside the sphere can’t affect anything inside the sphere, even if cast with a higher level spell slot. Targeting something inside the sphere or including the sphere’s space in an area has no effect on anything inside.

actions.name: Teleport (7th-Level; V)
actions.desc: Sidsi teleports to a location they are familiar with on the same plane of existence.

reactions.name: Counterspell (3rd-Level; S).
reactions.desc: When a creature Sidsi can see within 60 feet casts a spell, she attempts to interrupt it. If the creature is casting a 2nd-level spell or lower, the spell fails. If the creature is casting a 3rd-level or higher spell, Sidsi makes an Intelligence check against a DC of 10 + the spell’s level. On a success, the spell fails, and the spellcasting creature can use its reaction to try to cast a second spell with the same casting time so long as it uses a spell slot level equal to or less than half the original spell slot. If Sisdi casts counterspell with a higher spell slot, the interrupted spell fails if its level is less than that of counterspell.

reactions.name: Shield (1st-Level; V, S).
reactions.desc: When Sidsi is hit by an attack or targeted by magic missile, they gain a +5 bonus to AC (including against the triggering attack) and immunity to magic missile. These benefits last until the start of their next turn.

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.desc: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn’t disturb the material they move through. While they use Earth Glide, the elemental can’t be used as a mount.

traits.name: Slam (Signature Attack).
traits.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 f., one target. Hit: 1d6 plus 2 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: 1st Level. Stretch Attack (2 Ferocity).
traits.desc: The elemental makes a signature attack with a reach of 10 feet. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB damage, and the elemental can pull the target 5 feet toward them.

traits.name: 3rd Level. Earthshaker (5 Ferocity).
traits.desc: The elemental strikes the ground, and each creature within 10 feet of them must succeed on a DC 10 plus PB Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone. The elemental’s caregiver automatically succeeds on this saving throw.

traits.name: 5th Level. Transmute Ground (8 Ferocity).
traits.desc: The elemental picks a 10-foot-square area of ground they can see within 30 feet of them. Each creature standing in the area must succeed on a DC 10 plus PB Strength saving throw or partially sink into the ground and become restrained. A creature can use their action to make a DC 10 plus PB Strength (Athletics) check, freeing themself or another creature within their reach on a success and ending the restrained condition for the freed creature.

bonus_actions.name: Toss Me.
bonus_actions.desc: While the elemental is within 5 feet of their caregiver or a dwarf character, they cak hurl them 5 times their caregivers Proficiency Bonus in feet in any direction, including up. If the character would normaly take damage from the fall after being thrown, they can negate the damage with a successful DC 15 Dexterity saving throw.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: The cutthroat deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when they hit with a weapon attack while they have advantage on the attack, or when the cutthroat’s target is within 5 feet of an ally of the cutthroat while the cutthroat doesn’t have disadvantage on the attack.

traits.name: Shortsword
traits.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Hand Crossbow
traits.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Cunning Action
bonus_actions.desc: The cutthroat takes the Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action.

bonus_actions.name: Rapid Attack
bonus_actions.desc: The cutthroat attacks with their shortsword

traits.name: Fanatic.
traits.desc: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened by creatures not in their cult.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Vicious Mockery (Cantrip; V).
actions.desc: A creature within 60 feet that can hear the minstrel makes a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage and has disadvantage on the first attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Invisibility (2nd-Level; V, S, M, Concentration).
actions.desc: The minstrelmor a creature they touch is invisible for 1 hour. The spell ends if the invisible creature attacks or casts a spell.

actions.name: Shatter (2nd-Level; V, S, M).
actions.desc: An ear-splitting ringing sound fills a 10-foot-radius sphere emanating from a point the minstrel can see within 60 feet. Creatures in the area make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 13 (3d8) thunder damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature made of stone, metal, or other inorganic material has disadvantage on its saving throw. Unattended objects in the area also take the damage.

actions.name: Hypnotic Pattern (3rd-Level; S, M, Concentration).
actions.desc: A swirling pattern of light appears at a point within 120 feet. Each creature within 10 feet of the pattern that can see it makes a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature is charmed for 1 minute. While charmed, the creature is incapacitated and its Speed is 0. The effect ends on a creature if it takes damage or if another creature uses an action to shake it out of its daze.

bonus_actions.name: Martial Encouragement.
bonus_actions.desc: Until the beginning of the minstrel’s next turn, one creature within 30 feet that can hear the minstrel deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage whenever it deals weapon damage.

bonus_actions.name: Healing Word (1st-Level; V).
bonus_actions.desc: The minstrel or a living creature within 60 feet regains 5 (1d4 + 3) hit points. The minstrel can’t cast this spell and a 1st-level or higher spell on the same turn.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 5 (2d4) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: The cutthroat deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when they hit with a weapon attack while they have advantage on the attack, or when the cutthroat’s target is within 5 feet of an ally of the cutthroat while the cutthroat doesn’t have disadvantage on the attack.

traits.name: Rapier
traits.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Hand Crossbow
traits.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Cunning Action
bonus_actions.desc: The cutthroat takes the Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action.

bonus_actions.name: Rapid Attack
bonus_actions.desc: The cutthroat attacks with their shortsword

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Fanatic.
traits.desc: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened by creatures not in their cult.

actions.name: Handaxe
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, Breaker (wood), defensive (light), dual-wielding, simple, thrown (20/60)ft, one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Vicious Mockery (Cantrip; V).
actions.desc: A creature within 60 feet that can hear the minstrel makes a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage and has disadvantage on the first attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

On a failure, the creature is charmed for 1 minute. While charmed, the creature is incapacitated and its Speed is 0. The effect ends on a creature if it takes damage or if another creature uses an action to shake it out of its daze.

bonus_actions.desc: Until the beginning of the minstrel’s next turn, one creature within 30 feet that can hear the minstrel deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage whenever it deals weapon damage.

bonus_actions.name: Healing Word (1st-Level; V).
bonus_actions.desc: The minstrel or a living creature within 60 feet regains 5 (1d4 + 3) hit points. The minstrel can’t cast this spell and a 1st-level or higher spell on the same turn.

traits.name: Aura of Courage
traits.desc: While the knight is conscious, allies within 10 feet are immune to being frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The knight attacks nwice with their greatsword.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage plus 5 (2d4) radiant damage.

actions.name: Lance (Monuted Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. hit: 9 (1d12+3) piercing damage. If the knight moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack, they deal an extra 13 (2d13) piercing damage, and the target makes a DC 14 Strenght saving throw, falling prone on a failiure. This attack is made with a disadvantage against targets within 5 feet.

actions.name: Lay On Hands (1/Day)
actions.desc: The knight touches a willing creature or themself and restores 30 hit points.

actions.name: Knightly Inspiration (1/Day)
actions.desc: The knight inspires creatures of their choice within 30 feet that can hear and understand them. For the next minute, inspired creatures gain an expertise die on attack rolls and saving throws. A creature can benefin from only one Knightly Inspiration at a time, and the knight cannot target themselves.

nested.callback: return `Kill one _${monster.name}_ for every ${monster.hp} damage dealt to the mob`
